column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ Surprised citizens reported a semi-submerged tuk tuk to the police at 6:15 am on July 16
column7: Khan Por Senchey.------After the authorities arrived and checked
column8: they found the three wheeler empty. A crane was brought out to rescue the vehicle
column9: license plate number 1HP-2781.------Cops are working on the theory that the driver was drunk and crashed into the lake unseen sometime in the early hours
column10: and then fled the scene.------After the recovery
column11: the cops took the tuk tuk way and will continue searching for the owner. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/462657
